login.description: Your existing safexwallet.dat has been detected. Login to create a new wallet.

form.view_keys_balance: View list of keys and balances
form.legacy_create_desc: This will generate a modern wallet file for use in the sails wallet for safex cash and token on the new blockchain, your old .dat file will remain in tact, we recommend backing it up; however, resort to using the new generated wallet file from now on

create.description: Choose this option if this is your first time using Safex

form.wallet_name: Give a name to your wallet
form.public_address_desc: This is where you receive safex cash and safex tokens to: share this to receive funds.
form.mnemonic_desc: This exact combination of words will restore your keys in the event you lost your device, or some other corruption happened. This information recreates your keys so do not share it or lose it. Secure this word combination.

open.description: Load up your existing wallet file and continue using Safex

restore.button: Restore wallet from keys or seeds
restore.description: Enter keys or 25 seed words to restore your Safex wallet.

back.description: Load a wallet from a number of options.

legacy.button: Import legacy wallet file v7 and earlier
legacy.description: Import a safexwallet.dat file here, a new file will be created

legacy_detected.title: Legacy Wallet Detected
legacy_detected.description: To proceed you will create a new v8 wallet file which will become your main wallet file.
